## Collections.IConvertingCollector type

A [Collector](./ts-utils.icollector.md) with non-branded `string` key and `number` index, and transformation of source items.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IConvertingCollector<TITEM extends ICollectible<string, number>, TSRC> = ICollector<string, number, TITEM, TSRC>;
```
